solution_line_template: Since there are {sets_per_hour} sets of {production_cycle_minutes} minutes in an hour, then in {total_hours} hours there are {total_hours} x {sets_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{sets_per_hour}={total_sets_of_30_minutes}>>{total_sets_of_30_minutes} sets of {production_cycle_minutes} minutes.

Hence, a machine that Sue oversees can produce {cans_per_cycle} cans x {total_sets_of_30_minutes} = <<{cans_per_cycle}*{total_sets_of_30_minutes}={total_cans}>>{total_cans} cans of soda in {total_hours} hours.
